game-card.name: Game Card
game-card.description: Which Sonic game's title card you want to use.

quality-type.name: Title Card Quality
quality-type.description:
Decides the style of the Title Card Sprites to use 

 OG - Original, pixelated sprites 

 HQ - High Quality, redrawn sprites

stay-time.name: Stay Time
stay-time.description: How long the Title Card should stay on screen (in seconds).

name: Sonic Title Cards
description: Adds Title Cards from Sonic games to GD!
